name: Authority to secure federal funds
text: §302A-1403  Authority to secure federal funds.  The department, the state public charter school commission, a charter school authorizer, director of finance, and governor may take such steps and perform such acts as may be necessary or proper to secure any such federal funds for the purposes specified in sections 302A-1401 and 302A-1402. [L 1996, c 89, pt of §2; am L 2006, c 298, §20; am L 2012, c 130, §13]
